post:
**Crazy sales from [NetDynamics24](http://netdynamics24.com "NetDynamics24") valid until April 30, 2021**

**===============
Dedicated Servers: 
===============**

**_The below servers are immediately available and there are no setup fees!_**

**AMD Ryzen 5 3600**
~~$59/month~~. Now only **$52/month**
RAM: 64 GB DDR4
Disks: 2 x 512 GB NVMe SSD or 2 x 2 TB Enterprise HDD
Unlimited Traffic @ 1 Gbit
1 IPv4
100 GB Remote Backup Space
Location: Germany/Finland
[order now](https://netdynamics24.com/client/order.php?step=1&productGroup=10&product=51 "order now")
